name: highlight.io
headline: The open source, fullstack monitoring platform: stop guessing whyâ¦
description:
highlight.io is the open source, full-stack monitoring platform. With just a few lines of code, Highlight makes it easy to understand what's slowing down your users and swiftly address errors and regressions on your web app.  Imagine that you have a customer reporting an issue on your web app. With highlight.io, you can playback their exact interactions to reproduce the bug and get notified of any future errors that could happen.

That being said, weâre just getting started! We have plans to go way deeper into your observability stack to give you all of the visibility you need. Join us on this journey:
- Star us on GitHub (https://github.com/highlight/highlight) to keep up with releases and news.
- Join our Discord (https://highlight.io/community) to share product feedback and thoughts.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:open-source; industry:monitoring; location:seattle

founders.name: Jay Khatri, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder / CEO @ Highlight (formerly founder @ Reploy, S20)

founders.name: Vadim Korolik, Founder
founders.description: Vadim Korolik is the founder and CTO of highlight.io, the open source session replay and error monitoring framework. A native of the Bay Area, Vadim previously worked at Pure Storage and drive.ai.

## The open source, fullstack Monitoring Platform.
[Get started](https://www.highlight.io/<https:/app.highlight.io/sign_up>)[Live demo](https://www.highlight.io/<https:/app.highlight.io/demo>)
Request a Demo Call
Session Replay
Error Monitoring
Logging
Traces
Dashboards
Self-Hosting
Explore Our Features
Session ReplayError MonitoringLoggingTracesDashboardsSelf-Hosting
##### Session Replay
#### Session Replay
Understand the real reason why bugs are happening in your web application.
[Learn More ](https://www.highlight.io/</session-replay>)
Console and Network Recording
Comprehensive Session Search
Powerful Privacy Controls
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsessionscreenshot.2415984d.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsession-replay.abf97e7c.webp&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
##### Error Monitoring
#### Error Monitoring
Get notified of the exceptions across your app before they become problematic.
[Learn More ](https://www.highlight.io/</error-monitoring>)
Custom Error Grouping
Customizable Alerting Rules
Powered by Open Telemetry
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmonitoringscreenshot.6f76b251.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ferror-monitoring.5c5bb18b.webp&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
##### Logging
#### Logging
Search for and set alerts for logs being written throughout your stack.
[Learn More ](https://www.highlight.io/</logging>)
Customizable Log Alerts
Widespread SDK Support
Powered by Clickhouse
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Floggingscreenshot.46986851.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffullstack-logging.dc7b688d.webp&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
##### Traces
#### Traces
Get performance insights on requests and transactions throughout your web application stack.
[Learn More ](https://www.highlight.io/</traces>)
Powerful Visualization Capabilities
Distributed Tracing Support
OpenTelemetry Support
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/static/media/tracesmobile.e8e1bdea.svg)
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftraces.96ac3dd7.webp&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
##### Dashboards & APM
#### Dashboards & APM
Visualize and analyze your observability data on a single pane.
[Learn More ](https://www.highlight.io/</dashboards>)
Customizable dashboards
Performance visualizations
User analytics
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/static/media/tracesmobile.e8e1bdea.svg)
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdashboards.8f0997df.webp&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
##### Self-Hosting highlight.io
#### Self-Hosting highlight.io
Interested in self-hosting highlight? Spin up highlight.io in docker with just a few commands.
[Learn More ](https://www.highlight.io/</docs/getting-started/self-host/overview>)
`git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/highlight/highlight;`
`cddocker;`
`./run-hobby.sh;`
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fgithubscreenshot.fb4645ff.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
![Feature Spotlight](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fopen-source.4864c173.webp&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)

## Web application monitoring for today's developer.
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow1.png&w=1080&q=75)
### A cohesive view of your entire stack.
A natural pairing between your errors, session replay, logs and more. Understand the “what”, “why” and “how” of your full-stack web application.
[Get started for free](https://www.highlight.io/<https:/app.highlight.io/sign_up>)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow1.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow2.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Support for all the modern frameworks.
We support all the fancy new frameworks and our platform is powered by open source, scalable technologies.
[View all frameworks](https://www.highlight.io/</frameworks>)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow2.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow3.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Integrations with your favorite tools.
Connect your favorite issue tracker, support tool, or even analytics software and we’ll give you a way to push and pull data in the right places.
[View all integrations](https://www.highlight.io/</integrations>)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow3.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FlandingInfoRowSecurity.7b55fb59.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
### Built with compliance and security.
Whether its SOC 2, HIPAA, or ISO, highlight.io can work with your stack. Contact us at security@highlight.io for more information.
[Read our docs](https://www.highlight.io/</docs/general/company/compliance-and-security>)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FlandingInfoRowSecurity.7b55fb59.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27375%27%20height=%27376%27/%3e)![hero](https://www.highlight.io/)
### Master OpenTelemetry with our Free Comprehensive Course
From fundamentals to advanced implementations, learn how OpenTelemetry can transform your engineering team's observability practices. Ideal for engineering leaders and developers building production-ready monitoring solutions.
[Start Learning](https://www.highlight.io/</otel-course-signup?utm_source=highlight-oss-cta>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27400%27%20height=%27400%27/%3e)![](https://www.highlight.io/)
Try Highlight Today

## Our customers
Highlight powers forward-thinking companies. More about our customers →⟨26⟩

## Web application monitoring for today's developer.
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow1.png&w=1080&q=75)
### A cohesive view of your entire stack.
A natural pairing between your errors, session replay, logs and more. Understand the “what”, “why” and “how” of your full-stack web application.
Get started for free⟨7⟩
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow1.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow2.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Support for all the modern frameworks.
We support all the fancy new frameworks and our platform is powered by open source, scalable technologies.
View all frameworks⟨28⟩
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow2.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow3.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Integrations with your favorite tools.
Connect your favorite issue tracker, support tool, or even analytics software and we’ll give you a way to push and pull data in the right places.
View all integrations⟨3⟩
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FlandingInfoRow3.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FlandingInfoRowSecurity.7b55fb59.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
### Built with compliance and security.
Whether its SOC 2, HIPAA, or ISO, highlight.io can work with your stack. Contact us at security@highlight.io for more information.
Read our docs⟨29⟩
![](https://www.highlight.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FlandingInfoRowSecurity.7b55fb59.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_A42MhRpqWbJjozQ3qbwwoKmj1QqZ)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27375%27%20height=%27376%27/%3e)![hero⟨27⟩]
### Master OpenTelemetry with our Free Comprehensive Course
From fundamentals to advanced implementations, learn how OpenTelemetry can transform your engineering team's observability practices. Ideal for engineering leaders and developers building production-ready monitoring solutions.
Start Learning⟨30⟩

generated_description:
**Highlight.io: Simplifying Full-Stack Monitoring for Developers**

Founded in 2023 and based in Seattle, WA, Highlight.io is an open-source, full-stack monitoring platform configured to alleviate the common headaches developers face—specifically when trying to decipher user issues in their web applications. With a small yet dedicated team of 8, the company aims to bridge the gap between guesswork and action.

### What is Highlight.io?

At its core, Highlight.io enables developers to play back user interactions in their web apps seamlessly. This allows for immediate bug reproduction and faster error resolution. If a customer reports an issue, you can actually walk through their experience step-by-step. Think of it as a time machine for debugging.

The mission is straightforward: stop guessing why things aren't working as they should. Highlight.io is packed with features like session replay, error monitoring, logging, performance traces, and customizable dashboards, all designed to give developers clarity and confidence in their applications' performance. It’s a developer’s toolkit designed for the modern web landscape.

### Plans for the Future

Highlight.io isn’t satisfied with resting on its laurels. As they put it, "we're just getting started!" Their intentions to deepen their observability stack promises to deliver even more visibility to users in the months to come. If you're keen on what they're planning, consider checking out their GitHub page to follow updates, or hop onto their Discord community to share your thoughts and feedback.

### Diverse Features

1. **Session Replay**: Uncover the real reasons behind application bugs by viewing exact user sessions.
2. **Error Monitoring**: Stay ahead of issues with alerts about exceptions before users even notice them.
3. **Logging**: Monitor logs across your stack with customizable alerts tailored to your needs.
4. **Tracing**: Gain insights into performance across your app’s requests and transactions.
5. **Dashboards**: Visualize your observability data for a cohesive understanding of performance.

### Integration and Accessibility

Highlight.io integrates well with a variety of frameworks (like React, Vue.js, and Node.js) andcomes equipped with developer-friendly SDK support. Whether companies prefer to self-host or leverage cloud offerings, Highlight.io has provisions for both, thus accommodating diverse operational preferences.

### Community and Support

One of the company’s standout features is its community engagement. They encourage users to star their repository on GitHub and welcome discussions on Discord. It's a great way for developers to connect, share experiences, and improve upon existing features together.

### Conclusion

In a time where observability can often feel overwhelming, Highlight.io stands out with its promise of transparency. If you're looking to refine your web app's performance and user experience, Highlight.io offers not just tools but a community built around improvement and innovation. Explore more on their website [here](https://www.highlight.io/), or jump into the action by trying out their platform for free. 

This is more than just monitoring—it's the way forward for modern developers.
